sys_soap_message_function.envelope: <SOAP-ENV:Envelope xmlns:m="http://www.alarmpoint.com/webservices/schema" xmlns:SOAP-ENV="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:SOAP-ENC="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/encoding/" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" SOAP-ENV:encodingStyle="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/encoding/"> <SOAP-ENV:Body> <UpdateDevice xmlns="http://www.alarmpoint.com/webservices/schema"> <!-- nillable--> <user xsi:type="xsd:string">${wsUsername}</user> <!-- nillable--> <password xsi:type="xsd:string">${wsPassword}</password> <!-- nillable--> <clientTimestamp xsi:type="xsd:string"/> <!-- nillable--> <clientIP xsi:type="xsd:string"/> <!-- nillable--> <clientOSUser xsi:type="xsd:string"/> <!-- nillable--> <company xsi:type="xsd:string">${company}</company> <deviceIdentifier xsi:type="xsd:long">${deviceIdentifier}</deviceIdentifier> <!-- nillable--> <device xsi:type="m:DeviceParameters"> <voiceDevice xsi:type="m:SoapDevice"> <active xsi:type="xsd:boolean">${active}</active> <default xsi:type="xsd:boolean">${default}</default> <delay xsi:type="xsd:int">${delay}</delay> <!-- nillable--> <externallyOwned xsi:type="xsd:string">${externallyOwned}</externallyOwned> <!-- nillable--> <name xsi:type="xsd:string">${deviceName}</name> <!-- nillable--> <priorityThreshold xsi:type="xsd:string">${priorityThreshold}</priorityThreshold> <!-- nillable--> <userServiceProvider xsi:type="m:SoapUserServiceProvider"> <!-- nillable--> <identifier xsi:type="xsd:string"/> <!-- nillable--> <name xsi:type="xsd:string">${serviceProvider}</name> </userServiceProvider> <areaCode xsi:type="xsd:string">${areaCode}</areaCode> <countryCodeOverride xsi:type="xsd:string">${countryCodeOverride}</countryCodeOverride> <extension xsi:type="xsd:string">${extension}</extension> <number xsi:type="xsd:string">${number}</number> </voiceDevice> </device> </UpdateDevice> </SOAP-ENV:Body> </SOAP-ENV:Envelope>
